Package org.example.controller

Class ImageController

java.lang.Object
org.example.controller.ImageController
@RestController @RequestMapping("api/v1/images") @EnableWebFlux @CrossOrigin(origins="*", methods={GET,POST,PUT,DELETE}) public class ImageController extends Object
REST controller for handling image-related operations.

  • Method Details

    • serveImage

      @GetMapping(value="/{imageName}", produces="image/jpeg") public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.core.io.Resource>> serveImage(@PathVariable("imageName") String imageName)
      Retrieves and serves an image by its name.
      Parameters:
      imageName - the name of the image to retrieve
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the image as an InputStreamResource

    • uploadImage

      @PostMapping(consumes="multipart/form-data") public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String>> uploadImage(@RequestPart("image") reactor.core.publisher.Flux<org.springframework.http.codec.multipart.FilePart> filePartFlux)
      Uploads an image file.
      Parameters:
      filePartFlux - the Flux of FilePart representing the image file parts
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with a status and message indicating success or failure

    • renameImage

      @PostMapping("/rename") public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void>> renameImage(@RequestBody ChangeFileNameRequest changeFileNameRequest)
      Renames an existing image file.
      Parameters:
      changeFileNameRequest - the request containing old and new image file names
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with a status indicating success or failure
